story.author: CoolMonkey24
story.headline: Anime Subliminally Trains Viewers to use Superhuman Powers
story.subheading: Popular Cartoons may Grant Unintended Abilities.

article.p: Home studies have shown that binging lots of anime has the potential to unlock hidden brain powers.

A twelve year old from the east coast has reported that after watching anime for 32 hours straight he suddenly developed superhuman strength. “I just went outside, yelled really loud the move I was about to do and then lifted up a car.”
More studies will have to be conducted to verify these claims.
